description: List trucker shift sets (driver days) with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can view all trucker shift sets. Non-admins can view shift sets that are in their TruckerShiftSetPolicy scope, which is limited to shift sets with tender job schedule shifts visible through the TenderJobScheduleShift policy scope.
validation_notes: Boolean filters require true/false values: has-driver, is-expecting-time-sheet, without-time-card, without-approved-time-card, with-missing-time-card-approvals, without-approved-time-sheet, without-submitted-time-sheet, has-start-on, has-constraint. start-at expects an ISO 8601 timestamp. start-on, start-on-min, start-on-max, and driver-day-on expect YYYY-MM-DD dates.

flags.name: --trucker
flags.description: Filter by trucker ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --trailer
flags.description: Filter by trailer ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --trailer-classification
flags.description: Filter by trailer classification ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --tractor
flags.description: Filter by tractor ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --driver
flags.description: Filter by driver user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --driver-name
flags.description: Filter by driver name

flags.name: --driver-id
flags.description: Filter by driver user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --has-driver
flags.description: Filter by presence of a driver (true/false)

flags.name: --broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --broker-id
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --business-unit
flags.description: Filter by business unit ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --shifts
flags.description: Filter by tender job schedule shift IDs (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --customer
flags.description: Filter by customer ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --number-of-shifts-eq
flags.description: Filter by exact number of shifts

flags.name: --number-of-shifts-gte
flags.description: Filter by minimum number of shifts

flags.name: --is-expecting-time-sheet
flags.description: Filter by time sheet expectation (true/false)

flags.name: --without-time-card
flags.description: Filter by absence of time cards (true/false)

flags.name: --without-approved-time-card
flags.description: Filter by missing approved time cards (true/false)

flags.name: --with-missing-time-card-approvals
flags.description: Filter by missing time card approvals (true/false)

flags.name: --without-approved-time-sheet
flags.description: Filter by missing approved time sheets (true/false)

flags.name: --without-submitted-time-sheet
flags.description: Filter by missing submitted time sheets (true/false)

flags.name: --start-at
flags.description: Filter by shift set start-at timestamp (ISO 8601)

flags.name: --start-on
flags.description: Filter by shift set date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --start-on-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum shift set date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --start-on-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum shift set date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --has-start-on
flags.description: Filter by presence of shift set date (true/false)

flags.name: --driver-day-on
flags.description: Filter by driver day date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --has-constraint
flags.description: Filter by presence of constraints (true/false)

flags.name: --odometer-start-value
flags.description: Filter by odometer start value (exact)

flags.name: --odometer-start-value-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum odometer start value

flags.name: --odometer-start-value-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum odometer start value

flags.name: --odometer-end-value
flags.description: Filter by odometer end value (exact)

flags.name: --odometer-end-value-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum odometer end value

flags.name: --odometer-end-value-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum odometer end value
